summary.span: 在指定的 上使用线性内插对两个目标值之间的 属性值进行动画处理。

span.span: Animates the value of a property between two target values using linear interpolation over a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动画的时间段内更新的属性的值。An animation updates the value of a property over a period of time. 动画效果可能十分微小，例如移动左边和右边或比较极端，如同时对其进行旋转并更改其颜色增大到其原始大小的 200 倍的对象的几个像素。An animation effect can be subtle, such as moving a a few pixels left and right, or dramatic, such as enlarging an object to 200 times its original size while spinning it and changing its color. 若要创建在动画[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]，必须将动画关联对象的属性值。To create an animation in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], you must associate an animation with an object's property value. ## 目标值Target Values 类将创建两个目标值之间的转换。The class creates a transition between two target values. 若要设置其目标值，使用其， ，和属性。To set its target values, use its , , and properties. 下表总结了如何， ，和属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties specified|产生的行为Resulting behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||从指定的值的动画属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画属性设置为指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画的总和来指定的值的属性和属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和属性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| > [!NOTE] > 如果同时设置和属性，属性优先和忽略属性。If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. 有关将多个动画应用到单个属性的信息，请参阅[关键帧动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md)。For information about applying multiple animations to a single property, see [Key-Frame Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/key-frame-animations-overview.md). ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 因为类继承自，对象具有一些特殊功能，其中包括以下： 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享，使只读的以提高性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。Because the class inherits from , objects gain several special features, which include the following: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

span.span: Gets or sets the total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.

value.span: 动画更改其起始值所依据的总数。

span.span: The total amount by which the animation changes its starting value.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性时要进行动画处理"通过"一定量，而不是指定开始点或结束值的值。Use the property when you want to animate a value "by" a certain amount, rather than specifying a starting or ending value. 你还可以使用具有属性属性。You may also use the property with the property. 下表总结了如何， ，和属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties Specified|产生的行为Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||从指定的值的动画属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画属性设置为指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画的总和来指定的值的属性和属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和属性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **请注意**如果同时设置和属性，属性优先和忽略属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* `By`=""/><*object* `By`=""/> \- 或 -\- or - <*对象* `By`="{[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `By`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage \<*object*>\<*object*> <*object*.`By`><*object*.`By`> \< /> \\ ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓动函数可用于创建各种专用的动画效果包括会传来传去，弹簧振动以及各种的量值加速和减速的动画。Easing functions allow you to create a variety of specialized animation effects including bouncing, spring oscillations, and various magnitude acceleration and deceleration animations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表总结了如何， ，和属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties Specified|产生的行为Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||从指定的值的动画属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画属性设置为指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画的总和来指定的值的属性和属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和属性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **请注意**如果同时设置和属性，属性优先和忽略属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* `From`=""/><*object* `From`=""/> \- 或 -\- or - <*对象* `From`="{[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `From`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage \<*object*>\<*object*> <*object*.`By`><*object*.`By`> \< /> \\ ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建议使用的原始值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的起始值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 建议使用的目标值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的结束值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 一个 ，用来生成动画所使用的 或 。

span.span: An that generates the or used by the animation.

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由 确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the .

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个组合链中此值将为快照值 （如果有的话） 或基属性值; 否则此值将为返回链中的上一个动画的值不 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基本值，如果动画在动画的属性上的第一个组合层，则; 否则值为前一的组合图层的属性的动画的输出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果动画的只有一个其， ，或属性集，将此属性设置不起作用。If the animation has only one of its , , or properties set, setting this property has no effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier Field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖属性是异常，因为它的标识符字段来自于，并由共享各种派生的类。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsCumulative { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsCumulative
Public Property IsCumulative As Boolean
public: property bool IsCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定动画重复时是否累计该动画的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: **true**如果动画累计它的值时其属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。

span.span: **true** if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration.
otherwise, **false**.
The default value is **false**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为**true**，该动画的输出时，值仅累计该动画的属性使其重复播放其简单持续时间。When this property is set to **true**, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不会不会累计其值，因为其父重复重新启动时，或因为其时钟已重新启动从调用。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖属性是异常，因为它的标识符字段来自于，并由共享各种派生的类。This dependency property is unusual in that the identifier field for it comes from , and is shared by various derived classes.

The ending value of the animation.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表总结了如何， ，和属性可能一起使用或单独来确定动画的目标值。The following table summarizes how the , , and properties may be used together or separately to determine an animation's target values. |指定的属性Properties Specified|产生的行为Resulting Behavior| |--------------------------|------------------------| ||从指定的值的动画属性设为正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，具体取决于如何配置前一动画。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the base value of the property being animated or to a previous animation's output value, depending on how the previous animation is configured.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画属性设置为指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the property.| | 和 and |从指定的值的动画的总和来指定的值的属性和属性。The animation progresses from the value specified by the property to the value specified by the sum of the and properties.| ||动画转换从动画的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值与指定的值属性。The animation progresses from the animated property's base value or a previous animation's output value to the value specified by the property.| ||动画从正在进行动画处理的属性的基值或前一动画的输出值，该值与指定的值的要求和属性。The animation progresses from the base value of the property being animated or a previous animation's output value to the sum of that value and the value specified by the property.| **请注意**如果同时设置和属性，属性优先和忽略属性。**Note** If you set both the and properties, the property takes precedence and the property is ignored. 若要使用其他内插方法，或者两个以上的目标值之间进行动画处理，使用对象。To use other interpolation methods or animate between more than two target values, use a object. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* `To`=""/><*object* `To`=""/> \- 或 -\- or - <*对象* `To`="{[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `To`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage \<*object*>\<*object*> <*object*.`By`><*object*.`By`> \< /> \\ ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
